snippet: British life insurance and pensions group Standard Life has announced it is in "exclusive and advanced" talks to buy rival Phoenix Group Holdings' Ignis Asset Management....

headline.print_headline: Standard Life in Advanced Talks to Buy Phoenix Asset Management Unit
headline.main: Standard Life in Advanced Talks to Buy Phoenix Asset Management Unit

lead_paragraph: British life insurance and pensions group Standard Life has announced it is in "exclusive and advanced" talks to buy rival Phoenix Group Holdings' Ignis Asset Management.
